description: This file defines the SettingsScreen widget for a Flutter app, presenting user preferences such as notifications, high contrast mode, and language settings. It builds a UI with interactive elements linked to a SettingsProvider.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays the application's settings UI, including notifications, contrast mode, and language options.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the SettingsScreen, including a loading indicator, error message, and preferences form.
